bot.summary: User asks why the name 'Saurus' is added to the end of dinosaur names. Gweedo explains that the naming convention is rooted in the Latin word 'Sauria', which means 'reptile'. Dinosaurs were classified as reptiles in the past, hence the name. Understanding biology's classification system is crucial for comprehending dinosaur names. Each name reflects their characteristics and history. Gweedo emphasizes the importance of biological classification and hints at the depth of understanding that can be gained from it.

bot.summary: User asks why the name 'Saurus' is added to the end of dinosaur names. Gweedo explains that the naming convention is rooted in the Latin word 'Sauria', which means 'reptile'. Dinosaurs were classified as reptiles in the past, hence the name. Understanding biology's classification system is crucial for comprehending dinosaur names. Each name reflects their characteristics and history. Gweedo emphasizes the importance of biological classification and hints at the depth of understanding that can be gained from it. User inquires about what a second field is. Gweedo explains that it is a scientific concept in the field of electromagnetism, requiring an understanding of the theory of electric fields first. The second field stores charge in capacitance within electromagnetism, and understanding this concept leads to a deeper understanding of the relationship between electricity and magnetism. Gweedo recommends studying electromagnetism further for a detailed understanding but limits the explanation due to time constraints.
bot.response: 동물 이름도 과학이죠. 동물의 과학. 동물 이름은 종족이나 특성을 나타내기 위해 부여되는 경우가 많습니다. 예를 들어, 'Felis catus'는 고양이의 학명으로, 'Felis'는 고양이의 속을 나타내고 'catus'는 집종을 의미합니다. 이러한 명명법을 토대로 동물의 분류와 특성을 이해할 수 있어요. 이름에는 종족을 나타내는 부분이 자주 포함되어 있습니다. 분류학에 관심이 있으시다면 더 깊이 공부하시면 될 것 같아요. 분류학은 동물 이름에 대한 흥미로운 정보를 제공해줘요. 생물학적인 명명법을 통해 동물에 대한 이해가 더욱 풍부해질 거예요. [동물 분류학]도 연관되어 있어요. 하지만 시간 관계상 여기까지만 말하겠습니다.
